review_content:
Amber with nice mid foam

Nose: floral sweet malt, with slight citrusy, pine, peach, and vegetation 

Taste: very creamy, heavy and jammy.  Slight welcoming carbonation burn.  Full of mint and hops.  Long minty and strong hop bitterness finish.

Poured a clear orange amber with a small lingering ivory head. Aromas of biscuit, earthiness, light grapefruit and light pine. Palate was light to medium bodied and crisp with a smooth dry finish. Flavors of biscuit, earthiness, light pine and light grapefruit with a smooth dry bitter lingering earthy finish.
